margin-bottom: 0\">\n        <!-- /.navbar -->\n\t\t<font color=\"#0000FF\" size=\"5\">News!</font></h3>\n\n\t<p>Our group won <font size=\"4\" color=\"#FF0000\"> the best paper award\n\t</font> from<a href=\"http://icdcs2018.ocg.at/\"><font size=\"4\"> ICDCS 2018 (1 out of 378 submissions) </font></a><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> for work titled </font><a href=\"./Papers/SymBee.pdf\"><font size=\"4\"> \"Symbol-level Cross-technology Communication via Payload Encoding\". <font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> This work demonstrates the feasibility of reverse cross-technology communication from low-end devices (ZigBee) to high-end devices (Wi-Fi) </font> </font></a><font size=\"4\">  </font></p>\n    \n\t<p>Our group won <font size=\"4\" color=\"#FF0000\"> the best paper award\n\t</font> from<a href=\"https://www.sigmobile.org/mobicom/2017/program.php\"><font size=\"4\"> MobiCom 2017 (1 out of 186 submissions) </font></a><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> for work titled </font><a href=\"./Papers/WEBee.pdf\"><font size=\"4\"> \"WEBee: Physical-Layer Cross-Technology Communication via Emulation\". </font> </a> <font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"></font> <font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> WEBee video can be found </font> <a href=\"https://youtu.be/O5SgCmKbZYI\"><font size=\"4\"> here </font></a><font size=\"4\"> </font><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">.  <font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> WEBee release and technical support can be found </font> <a href=\"http://tianhe.cs.umn.edu/CTC\"><font size=\"4\"> here </font></a><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">.  Here are the <a href=\"./Papers/WEBeeTalk.pdf\"> slides </a> and  <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8IBGfGi4f14\"> conference talk video </a> .\n\t</font></font></p><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">\n  <p>Our group won <font size=\"4\" color=\"#FF0000\">  the best paper award\n\t</font>from <a href=\"http://sensys.acm.org/2017/\"><font size=\"4\"> SenSys 2017 (1 out of 151 submissions) </font><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">\n\t</font></a><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> for work titled </font><a href=\"./Papers/SmartLight.pdf\"><font size=\"4\"> \"SmartLight: Light-weight 3D Indoor Localization Using a Single LED Lamp\". </font> </a> <font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"></font> <font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"> It is the first pure digital approach for 3D indoor localization. </font> </p>\n  <p><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">Congratulations to\n\t</font><a href=\"http://www-users.cs.umn.edu/~zhang/\"><font size=\"4\">Desheng \n\tZhang</font><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">\n\t</font></a><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">for successfully landing \n\ttenure-track assistant professorship in Rutgers University (US News Rank \n\t34).&nbsp; So far, eight students from the group joined reputable \n\tuniversities as tenure-track assistant professors in the first employment.\n\t</font></p>\n\t<p><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\">Congratulations to\n\t<a href=\"http://www-users.cs.umn.edu/~ksong/\">Song Min Kim</a> for \n\tsuccessfully landing tenure-track assistant professorship in George Manson \n\tUniversity (US News Rank 67).&nbsp;</font></p>\n\t</font><p><font size=\"4\" color=\"#000000\"><font size=\"4\">I will recruit multiple Ph.D. students \n\tfall 2018. If you are self-motivated, diligent with a strong system \n\tbackground and (of course) interested, please mention my name in the cover \n\tletter of the application package to the department. more information about \n\tour MiNDs group, please check </font><font size=\"3\" color=\"#000000\"> <a href=\"http://tianhe.cs.umn.edu/\">\n\thttp://tianhe.cs.umn.edu</a></font><font size=\"3\">, Thanks!</font></font></p></font></div><font face=\"Times New Roman\"><font face=\"Times New Roman\">\n      \n\t\t<h3 style=\"margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0\">\n<font face=\"Times New Roman\" color=\"#0000FF\" size=\"5\">Short \nBiography</font></h3>\n<table border=\"0\" width=\"100%\" id=\"table3\" style=\"font-size: 1em; empty-cells: show; border: 0 none; margin: 0; padding: 0\">\n\t<tbody><tr style=\"border: 0 none; margin: 0; padding: 0\">\n\t\t<td style=\"font-family: arial,sans-serif\" width=\"70%\">\n\t\t\t\t\n\t\t<p align=\"justify\"><font face=\"Times New Roman\">\n\t\t<span style=\"font-weight: 400; font-size: 12pt\">Dr. Tian He is currently \n\t\ta full professor in the Department of Computer Science and \n\t\tEngineering at the University of Minnesota-Twin Cities. He received the \n\t\tPh.D. degree under Professor John A. Stankovic from th</span></font><span style=\"font-weight: 400; font-size: 12pt\"><font face=\"Times New Roman\">e University of \n\t\tVirginia, Virginia. Dr. He is the author and co-author of over \n\t\t280 papers in premier network journals and conferences with over \n\t\t<a href=\"https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=hc1m_BQAAAAJ&amp;hl=en\">\n\t\t22,000 citations</a> \n\t\t(H-Index 65). Dr. He is the recipient of the NSF CAREER Award (2009), \n\t\tMcKnight Land-Grant Chaired Professorship (2011), George W. Taylor \n\t\tDistinguished Research Award (2015), China NSF Outstanding Overseas \n\t\tYoung Researcher I and II (2012 and 2016), and eight best paper awards in \n\t\tinternational conferences including MobiCom, SenSys, and ICDCS. Dr. He has served a few general/program chair \n\t\tpositions in international conferences and on many program committees \n\t\tand also has been an editorial board member for six international \n\t\tjournals including ACM Transactions on Sensor Networks, IEEE \n\t\tTransactions on Computers and IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking. His research includes wireless networks, networked sensing systems, \n\t\tcyber-physical systems, Internet of Things (IOT), and distributed systems in general. He is an ACM and IEEE Fellow.</font></span></p></td>\n\t\t\n\t\t\n\t\t\n\t</tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<h3 style=\"margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0\">\n<font face=\"Times New Roman\" color=\"#0000FF\" size=\"5\">Research Awards</font></h3>\n\t<ul>\n    <li>\n    \t\t<p style=\"margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0\">\n\t\t<font face=\"Times New Roman\" size=\"3\"> \n\t  Best Paper Award,&nbsp; ICDCS 2018 </font></p></li>\n\t\t<li>\n\t\t<p style=\"margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0\">\n\t\t<font face=\"Times New Roman\" size=\"3\"> \n\t  Best Paper Award,&nbsp; MobiCom 2017</font></p></li>\n    \t\t<li>\n\t\t<p style=\"margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0\">\n\t\t<font face=\"Times New Roman\" size=\"3\"> \n\t  Best Paper Award,&nbsp; SenSys 2017</font></p></li>\n    <li>\n\t\t<p style=\"margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0\">\n\t\t<font face=\"Times New Roman\" size=\"3\">George \n\tW.
